update.description:
* Any new user of cloudsim can request to participate in SRC:

    ![req1.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/3722556608-req1.png)

    * This creates a `srcsignup-xxx` resource in the widgets server

* Cloudsim admin and src-admins can see a list of pending requests:

    ![req2.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/1315229124-req2.png)

* If the admin declines, the `srcsignup-xxx` resource is deleted from the widgets server

* If the admin accepts:

    1. Send a request to the auth server to add the user to team `src-competitors`

    1. If 1. is successful, delete the `srcsignup-xxx` resource from the widgets server

    1. The next time the user logs in, they can see the competitor's kiosk



This pull request removes the need for env variables with user names. Now the cloudsim admin can create teams and add users through the interface.
update.title: Registrations for SRC
